song_lyrics: Hare hare rangake bhūṣhan basan pe’re,
Hari shāl jorī orī haryo mere chittaku. Hare. Ṭek
Haryo bāgo Hari pāgh haryo pītāmbar kanṭhī;
Hare nang jaḍit hār pe’rī jore prītaku. Hare. 1
Hare rang jaḍit nang angad kankan kar,
Hari mojarī charan pe’rī āvat (Hari) itaku;
Haryo bāj haryo sāj chaḍhe tāpar Mahārāj,
Premānand thakit bhayo lakhī Mohan mītaku. Hare. 2
title: Hare hare rangake bhūṣhan basan pe’re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1181: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
